needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text: The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza include prosciutto, but also other important elements such as making your system better at least in some small way every day or two, being able to explain what your site is about, and giving people everything you've got.
